channel.title: Runescape Client Development
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b] Some of you may know me from some previous project I have done, most of them are finished now and I have released every single one of them. So far, runescape private servers are starting to bore me, although the servers are the clients seems to interest me for some reason. I have been doing some research into this and I found that most of the runescape client are terribly coded and are totally messed up.
[b]Information[/b] I have started development a new client using MITB's 317 deob and I have made some progress from there, hopefully I will be creating this, along with adding a lot of features for this community to start using. I will be adding a lot of the "new" runescape models into this client.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Can add items without damaging the cache[/li] [li]508 Look[/li] [li]Fixed chatbox[/li][/ul]
I am looking to add a lot more to this client, this is all I have completed yet, pictures will be coming soon after I have my dinner.

item.title: Runescape Client Development
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Newty:

If no pictures or proof that you have been working on this project have been posted by tommorrow, it will be locked.

Could you please lock, I have some more improtant project to do at the moment, I will resume this when I finish RSPSoft’s RS2DV server.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Client Development
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Sounds like its going to be fantastic. Can’t you just do model preloading? Also if you can make it have the 317 login thingy but its a 500+ cache that u can keep adding new cache into that would be MEAN!!!

Read full topic

So far, runescape private servers are starting to bore me, although the servers are the clients seems to interest me for some reason. I have been doing some research into this and I found that most of the runescape client are terribly coded and are totally messed up.
